click-the-link: Just click on the link in that email to complete your register. If you don't see it, you may check your spam folder.
email-confirmed-message: You can safely close this tab.
email-not-confirmed: Your email has not been confirmed.
email-not-confirmed-message: The token is invalid or expired.
enter-email: Enter your e-mail and we'll send you a link to reset your password
log-out-confirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
wrong-login-or-password: Wrong login or password. Try again.
